description: LifecycleHook defines a specific deployment lifecycle action. Only one type of action may be specified at any time.

failurePolicy.description: FailurePolicy specifies what action to take if the hook fails.

execNewPod.description: ExecNewPod specifies the options for a lifecycle hook backed by a pod.

tagImages.description: TagImages instructs the deployer to tag the current image referenced under a container onto an image stream tag.
